df-zrh
blocks.content: Define the unique homomorphism from the integers into a ring. This encodes the usual notation of ` n = 1r + 1r + ... + 1r ` for integers (see also ~ df-mulg ). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jun-2015.) (Revised by AV, 12-Jun-2019.)

blocks.name: df-zlm
blocks.content: Augment an abelian group with vector space operations to turn it into a ` ZZ ` -module. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Oct-2015.) (Revised by AV, 12-Jun-2019.)

blocks.name: df-chr
blocks.content: The characteristic of a ring is the smallest positive integer which is equal to 0 when interpreted in the ring, or 0 if there is no such positive integer. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Sep-2015.)

blocks.name: df-zn
blocks.content: Define the ring of integers ` mod n ` . This is literally the quotient ring of ` ZZ ` by the ideal ` n ZZ ` , but we augment it with a total order. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jun-2015.) (Revised by AV, 12-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-zn(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(czn, cmpt(s0, cn0, csb(s1, zring, csb(s2, co(cv(s1), cqus, co(cv(s1), cqg, cfv(cfv(crsp, cv(s1)), csn(cv(s0))))), co(cv(s2), csts, cop(cfv(cple, cnx), csb(s3, cres(cfv(czrh, cv(s2)), cif(cz, co(nat0, cfzo, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), nat0))), ccom(ccom(cv(s3), cle), ccnv(cv(s3))))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-zn(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ‚ä¢ Z/nZ =(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0 ‚Ü¶[ZZring / s1][(s1[/s](s1[~QG]((RSpan ` s1)` { s0 })))/ s2](s2[sSet]<(le ` ndx),[((ZRHom ` s2)|` if(s0 = 0, ‚Ñ§,(0[..^]s0)))/ s3]((s3 ‚àò ‚â§)‚àò `' s3)>))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
}

blocks.name: zrhval
blocks.content: Define the unique homomorphism from the integers to a ring or field. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jun-2015.) (Revised by AV, 12-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm zrhval(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(c0, cuni(co(zring, crh, c1)))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(czrh, c1))
} = {
  eqtri(c0, cuni(co(zring, crh, c1)), cfv(czrh, c1))
  pm2.61i(wceq(cfv(czrh, c1), cuni(co(zring, crh, c1))), wcel(c1, universe))
  fvmpt(hs0, c1, universe, czrh, cuni(co(zring, crh, c1)), cuni(co(zring, crh, cv(hs0))))
  unieqd(co(zring, crh, cv(hs0)), co(zring, crh, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c1, zring, crh)
  df-zrh(hs0)
  uniex(co(zring, crh, c1))
  ovex(zring, crh, c1)
  eqtr4d(cfv(czrh, c1), cuni(co(zring, crh, c1)), emptycls, wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  fvprc(c1, czrh)
  syl6eq(cuni(co(zring, crh, c1)), emptycls, cuni(emptycls), wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  unieqd(co(zring, crh, c1), emptycls, wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  ovprc2(c1, zring, crh)
  reldmmpt2(hs0, hs1, crh, crg, crg, cin(co(cv(hs0), cghm, cv(hs1)), co(cfv(cmgp, cv(hs0)), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, cv(hs1)))))
  dfrhm2(hs0, hs1)
  uni0()
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(co(zring, crh, c1)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(crg)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm zrhval(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ c0 = ‚ãÉ(ZZring[RingHom]c1)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(ZRHom ` c1)
} = {
  eqtri(c0, ‚ãÉ(ZZring[RingHom]c1), (ZRHom ` c1))
  pm2.61i((ZRHom ` c1)= ‚ãÉ(ZZring[RingHom]c1), c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvmpt(hs0, c1, universe, czrh, ‚ãÉ(ZZring[RingHom]c1), ‚ãÉ(ZZring[RingHom]hs0))
  unieqd((ZZring[RingHom]hs0), (ZZring[RingHom]c1), hs0 = c1)
  oveq2(hs0, c1, zring, crh)
  df-zrh(hs0)
  uniex((ZZring[RingHom]c1))
  ovex(zring, crh, c1)
  eqtr4d((ZRHom ` c1), ‚ãÉ(ZZring[RingHom]c1), emptycls, ¬¨ c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvprc(c1, czrh)
  syl6eq(‚ãÉ(ZZring[RingHom]c1), emptycls, ‚ãÉ ‚àÖ, ¬¨ c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  unieqd((ZZring[RingHom]c1), emptycls, ¬¨ c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  ovprc2(c1, zring, crh)
  reldmmpt2(hs0, hs1, crh, crg, crg, ((hs0[GrpHom]hs1)‚ãÇ((mulGrp ` hs0)[MndHom](mulGrp ` hs1))))
  dfrhm2(hs0, hs1)
  uni0()
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(‚ãÉ(ZZring[RingHom]c1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(crg)
}

blocks.name: zrhval2
blocks.content: Alternate value of the ` ZRHom ` homomorphism. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jun-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm zrhval2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, cz, co(cv(s0), c2, c3))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(czrh, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cmg, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cur, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  syl5eq(c1, cmpt(s0, cz, co(cv(s0), c2, c3)), cuni(co(zring, crh, c0)), wcel(c0, crg))
  zrhval(c1, c0)
  syl6eq(cuni(co(zring, crh, c0)), cmpt(s0, cz, co(cv(s0), c2, c3)), cuni(csn(cmpt(s0, cz, co(cv(s0), c2, c3)))), wcel(c0, crg))
  unieqd(co(zring, crh, c0), csn(cmpt(s0, cz, co(cv(s0), c2, c3))), wcel(c0, crg))
  mulgrhm2(s0, c0, cmpt(s0, cz, co(cv(s0), c2, c3)), c2, c3)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, cz, co(cv(s0), c2, c3)))
  unisn(cmpt(s0, cz, co(cv(s0), c2, c3)))
  mptex(s0, cz, co(cv(s0), c2, c3))
  zex()
  diff.cz.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm zrhval2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà Ring ‚Üí c1 =(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚Ü¶(s0[c2]c3)))
  ‚ä£ c1 =(ZRHom ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(.g ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(1r ` c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  syl5eq(c1, (s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚Ü¶(s0[c2]c3)), ‚ãÉ(ZZring[RingHom]c0), c0 ‚àà Ring)
  zrhval(c1, c0)
  syl6eq(‚ãÉ(ZZring[RingHom]c0), (s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚Ü¶(s0[c2]c3)), ‚ãÉ {(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚Ü¶(s0[c2]c3))}, c0 ‚àà Ring)
  unieqd((ZZring[RingHom]c0), {(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚Ü¶(s0[c2]c3))}, c0 ‚àà Ring)
  mulgrhm2(s0, c0, (s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚Ü¶(s0[c2]c3)), c2, c3)
  eqid((s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚Ü¶(s0[c2]c3)))
  unisn((s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚Ü¶(s0[c2]c3)))
  mptex(s0, cz, (s0[c2]c3))
  zex()
  diff.cz.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: zrhmulg
blocks.content: Value of the ` ZRHom ` homomorphism. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jun-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm zrhmulg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, cz)), wceq(cfv(c2, c1), co(c1, c3, c4)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(czrh, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cmg, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cur, c0))
} = {
  sylan9eq(cfv(c2, c1), co(c1, c3, c4), cfv(cmpt(hs0, cz, co(cv(hs0), c3, c4)), c1), wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, cz))
  fveq1d(c2, c1, cmpt(hs0, cz, co(cv(hs0), c3, c4)), wcel(c0, crg))
  zrhval2(hs0, c0, c2, c3, c4)
  fvmpt(hs0, c1, cz, cmpt(hs0, cz, co(cv(hs0), c3, c4)), co(c1, c3, c4), co(cv(hs0), c3, c4))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c1, c3, c4)
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, cz, co(cv(hs0), c3, c4)))
  ovex(c1, c3, c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cz)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c1, c3, c4))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm zrhmulg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà Ring ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§)‚Üí(c2 ` c1)=(c1[c3]c4))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(ZRHom ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(.g ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(1r ` c0)
} = {
  sylan9eq((c2 ` c1), (c1[c3]c4), ((hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚Ü¶(hs0[c3]c4))` c1), c0 ‚àà Ring, c1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§)
  fveq1d(c2, c1, (hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚Ü¶(hs0[c3]c4)), c0 ‚àà Ring)
  zrhval2(hs0, c0, c2, c3, c4)
  fvmpt(hs0, c1, cz, (hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚Ü¶(hs0[c3]c4)), (c1[c3]c4), (hs0[c3]c4))
  oveq1(hs0, c1, c3, c4)
  eqid((hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚Ü¶(hs0[c3]c4)))
  ovex(c1, c3, c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cz)
  diff.hs0.c((c1[c3]c4))
}

blocks.name: zrhrhmb
blocks.content: The ` ZRHom ` homomorphism is the unique ring homomorphism from ` Z ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jun-2015.) (Revised by AV, 12-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm zrhrhmb(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, crg), wb(wcel(c1, co(zring, crh, c0)), wceq(c1, c2)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(czrh, c0))
} = {
  syl6bb(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, co(zring, crh, c0)), wceq(c1, c2), wcel(c1, csn(c2)))
  eleq2d(c1, co(zring, crh, c0), csn(c2), wcel(c0, crg))
  eqtr4d(co(zring, crh, c0), csn(c2), csn(cmpt(hs0, cz, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmg, c0), cfv(cur, c0)))), wcel(c0, crg))
  mulgrhm2(hs0, c0, cmpt(hs0, cz, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmg, c0), cfv(cur, c0))), cfv(cmg, c0), cfv(cur, c0))
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, cz, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmg, c0), cfv(cur, c0))))
  sneqd(c2, cmpt(hs0, cz, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmg, c0), cfv(cur, c0))), wcel(c0, crg))
  zrhval2(hs0, c0, c2, cfv(cmg, c0), cfv(cur, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cmg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cur, c0))
  elsn2(c1, c2)
  fvexi(c2, czrh, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cmg, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cur, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm zrhrhmb(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà Ring ‚Üí(c1 ‚àà(ZZring[RingHom]c0)‚Üî c1 = c2))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(ZRHom ` c0)
} = {
  syl6bb(c0 ‚àà Ring, c1 ‚àà(ZZring[RingHom]c0), c1 = c2, c1 ‚àà { c2 })
  eleq2d(c1, (ZZring[RingHom]c0), { c2 }, c0 ‚àà Ring)
  eqtr4d((ZZring[RingHom]c0), { c2 }, {(hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚Ü¶(hs0[(.g ` c0)](1r ` c0)))}, c0 ‚àà Ring)
  mulgrhm2(hs0, c0, (hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚Ü¶(hs0[(.g ` c0)](1r ` c0))), (.g ` c0), (1r ` c0))
  eqid((hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚Ü¶(hs0[(.g ` c0)](1r ` c0))))
  sneqd(c2, (hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚Ü¶(hs0[(.g ` c0)](1r ` c0))), c0 ‚àà Ring)
  zrhval2(hs0, c0, c2, (.g ` c0), (1r ` c0))
  eqid((.g ` c0))
  eqid((1r ` c0))
  elsn2(c1, c2)
  fvexi(c2, czrh, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((.g ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c((1r ` c0))
}

blocks.name: zrhpropd
blocks.content: The ` ZZ ` ring homomorphism depends only on the ring attributes of a structure. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jun-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm zrhpropd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(czrh, c0), cfv(czrh, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(s1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr4g(cfv(czrh, c0), cfv(czrh, c1), cuni(co(zring, crh, c0)), cuni(co(zring, crh, c1)), w0)
  unieqd(co(zring, crh, c0), co(zring, crh, c1), w0)
  rhmpropd(s0, s1, zring, c0, zring, c1, cfv(cbs, zring), c2, w0)
  eqidd(cfv(cbs, zring), w0)
  eqidd(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, zring), cv(s1)), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, zring)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, zring)))))
  eqidd(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, zring), cv(s1)), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, zring)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, zring)))))
  zrhval(cfv(czrh, c0), c0)
  eqid(cfv(czrh, c0))
  zrhval(cfv(czrh, c1), c1)
  eqid(cfv(czrh, c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cbs, zring)
  diff.cbs.s(s0)
  diff.zring.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cbs, zring)
  diff.cbs.s(s1)
  diff.zring.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm zrhpropd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(ZRHom ` c0)=(ZRHom ` c1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 =(Base ` c0))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 =(Base ` c1))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2))‚Üí(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)=(s0[(+ ` c1)]s1))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2))‚Üí(s0[(√ó ` c0)]s1)=(s0[(√ó ` c1)]s1))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr4g((ZRHom ` c0), (ZRHom ` c1), ‚ãÉ(ZZring[RingHom]c0), ‚ãÉ(ZZring[RingHom]c1), w0)
  unieqd((ZZring[RingHom]c0), (ZZring[RingHom]c1), w0)
  rhmpropd(s0, s1, zring, c0, zring, c1, (Base ` ZZring), c2, w0)
  eqidd((Base ` ZZring), w0)
  eqidd((s0[(+ ` ZZring)]s1), (w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà(Base ` ZZring)‚àß s1 ‚àà(Base ` ZZring))))
  eqidd((s0[(√ó ` ZZring)]s1), (w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà(Base ` ZZring)‚àß s1 ‚àà(Base ` ZZring))))
  zrhval((ZRHom ` c0), c0)
  eqid((ZRHom ` c0))
  zrhval((ZRHom ` c1), c1)
  eqid((ZRHom ` c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cbs, zring)
  diff.cbs.s(s0)
  diff.zring.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cbs, zring)
  diff.cbs.s(s1)
  diff.zring.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: zlmval
blocks.content: Augment an abelian group with vector space operations to turn it into a ` ZZ ` -module. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Oct-2015.) (Revised by AV, 12-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm zlmval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, co(co(c0, csts, cop(cfv(csca, cnx), zring)), csts, cop(cfv(cvsca, cnx), c3))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(czlm, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cmg, c0))
} = {
  syl5eq(c2, co(co(c0, csts, cop(cfv(csca, cnx), zring)), csts, cop(cfv(cvsca, cnx), c3)), cfv(czlm, c0), wcel(c0, c1))
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(czlm, c0), co(co(c0, csts, cop(cfv(csca, cnx), zring)), csts, cop(cfv(cvsca, cnx), c3))), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, universe, czlm, co(co(c0, csts, cop(cfv(csca, cnx), zring)), csts, cop(cfv(cvsca, cnx), c3)), co(co(cv(hs0), csts, cop(cfv(csca, cnx), zring)), csts, cop(cfv(cvsca, cnx), cfv(cmg, cv(hs0)))))
  oveq12d(co(cv(hs0), csts, cop(cfv(csca, cnx), zring)), csts, cop(cfv(cvsca, cnx), cfv(cmg, cv(hs0))), co(c0, csts, cop(cfv(csca, cnx), zring)), cop(cfv(cvsca, cnx), c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c0, csts, cop(cfv(csca, cnx), zring))

thm zlmlem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c2))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(czlm, c1))

  -| wbr(c3, clt, nat5)
} = {
  pm2.61i(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c2)), wcel(c1, universe))
  syl6reqr(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c0, co(co(c1, csts, cop(cfv(csca, cnx), zring)), csts, cop(cfv(cvsca, cnx), cfv(cmg, c1)))), wcel(c1, universe))
  fveq2d(c0, c2, co(co(c1, csts, cop(cfv(csca, cnx), zring)), csts, cop(cfv(cvsca, cnx), cfv(cmg, c1))), wcel(c1, universe))
  zlmval(c1, universe, c2, cfv(cmg, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cmg, c1))
  eqtri(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, co(co(c1, csts, cop(cfv(csca, cnx), zring)), csts, cop(cfv(cvsca, cnx), cfv(cmg, c1)))), cfv(c0, co(c1, csts, cop(cfv(csca, cnx), zring))))
  setsnid(c0, c1, cfv(csca, cnx), zring)
  neeqtrri(cfv(c0, cnx), cfv(csca, cnx), nat5)
  ltneii(cfv(c0, cnx), nat5)
  scandx()
  setsnid(c0, co(c1, csts, cop(cfv(csca, cnx), zring)), cfv(cvsca, cnx), cfv(cmg, c1))
  ndxid(c0, c3)
  neeqtrri(cfv(c0, cnx), cfv(cvsca, cnx), nat6)
  ltneii(cfv(c0, cnx), nat6)
  mp2an(wbr(cfv(c0, cnx), clt, nat6), wbr(cfv(c0, cnx), clt, nat5), wbr(nat5, clt, nat6))
  eqbrtri(cfv(c0, cnx), clt, nat5, c3)
  5lt6()
  lttri(cfv(c0, cnx), nat5, nat6)
  eqeltri(cfv(c0, cnx), cr, c3)
  ndxarg(c0, c3)
  nnrei(c3)
  5re()
  6re()
  vscandx()
  3eqtr4a(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c2), emptycls, cfv(c0, emptycls), wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  str0(c0, c3)
  fvprc(c1, c0)
  fveq2d(c0, c2, emptycls, wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  syl5eq(c2, emptycls, cfv(czlm, c1), wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  fvprc(c1, czlm)
}

blocks.name: zlmassa
blocks.content: The ` ZZ ` -module operation turns a ring into an associative algebra over ` ZZ ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm zlmassa(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, casa))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(czlm, c0))
} = {

  a1i(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1)))
  zlmsca(c0, crg, c1)
  a1i(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(cz, cfv(cbs, zring)))
  zringbas()
  a1i(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(cfv(cmg, c0), cfv(cvsca, c1)))
  zlmvsca(cfv(cmg, c0), c1, c0)
  a1i(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(cfv(cmulr, c0), cfv(cmulr, c1)))

  ringabl(c0)

  biimpi(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, crg))

  zringcrng()
  mulgass2(c0, cv(hs2), cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0), cv(hs1), cfv(cmg, c0), cfv(cmulr, c0))
  mulgass3(c0, cv(hs2), cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0), cv(hs1), cfv(cmulr, c0), cfv(cmg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cmg, c0))
  sylibr(wcel(c1, casa), wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, crg))
  assaring(c1)
  ringprop(c0, c1)
  zlmbas(cfv(cbs, c0), c1, c0)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  zlmplusg(cfv(cplusg, c0), c1, c0)
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  zlmmulr(cfv(cmulr, c0), c1, c0)

  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, crg))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(c0, crg))
}

blocks.name: chrval
blocks.content: Definition substitution of the ring characteristic. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm chrval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c2)
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cod, c3))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cur, c3))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cchr, c3))
} = {
  eqtr2i(cfv(c0, c1), c2, cfv(cchr, c3))
  pm2.61i(wceq(cfv(cchr, c3), cfv(c0, c1)), wcel(c3, universe))
  fvmpt(hs0, c3, universe, cchr, cfv(c0, c1), cfv(cfv(cod, cv(hs0)), cfv(cur, cv(hs0))))
  fveq12d(cfv(cod, cv(hs0)), cfv(cur, cv(hs0)), c0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cod, cv(hs0)), c0, cfv(cod, c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c3, cod)
  syl6eqr(cfv(cur, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(cur, c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c3, cur)
  df-chr(hs0)
  fvex(c0, c1)
  eqtr4d(cfv(cchr, c3), cfv(c0, c1), emptycls, wn(wcel(c3, universe)))
  fvprc(c3, cchr)
  syl6eq(cfv(c0, c1), emptycls, cfv(emptycls, c1), wn(wcel(c3, universe)))
  fveq1d(c0, c1, emptycls, wn(wcel(c3, universe)))
  syl5eq(c0, emptycls, cfv(cod, c3), wn(wcel(c3, universe)))
  fvprc(c3, cod)
  0fv(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c0, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm chrval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ` c1)= c2

  ‚ä£ c2 =(chr ` c3)
} = {
  eqtr2i((c0 ` c1), c2, (chr ` c3))

  fvmpt(hs0, c3, universe, cchr, (c0 ` c1), ((od ` hs0)`(1r ` hs0)))
  fveq12d((od ` hs0), (1r ` hs0), c0, c1, hs0 = c3)
  syl6eqr((od ` hs0), c0, (od ` c3), hs0 = c3)
  fveq2(hs0, c3, cod)
  syl6eqr((1r ` hs0), c1, (1r ` c3), hs0 = c3)
  fveq2(hs0, c3, cur)
  df-chr(hs0)
  fvex(c0, c1)
  eqtr4d((chr ` c3), (c0 ` c1), emptycls, ¬¨ c3 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvprc(c3, cchr)
  syl6eq((c0 ` c1), emptycls, (‚àÖ ` c1), ¬¨ c3 ‚àà ùïå)
  fveq1d(c0, c1, emptycls, ¬¨ c3 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl5eq(c0, emptycls, (od ` c3), ¬¨ c3 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvprc(c3, cod)
  0fv(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c((c0 ` c1))
}

blocks.name: chrcl
blocks.content: Closure of the characteristic. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Sep-2015.)

blocks.name: chrid
blocks.content: The canonical ` ZZ ` ring homomorphism applied to a ring's characteristic is zero. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm chrid(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(cfv(c1, c2), c3))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cchr, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(czrh, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c0))
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(c1, c2), c3, co(c2, cfv(cmg, c0), cfv(cur, c0)), wcel(c0, crg))
  mpdan(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(cfv(c1, c2), co(c2, cfv(cmg, c0), cfv(cur, c0))), wcel(c2, cz))
  nn0zd(c2, wcel(c0, crg))
  chrcl(c0, c2)
  zrhmulg(c0, c2, c1, cfv(cmg, c0), cfv(cur, c0))
  syl5eqr(co(c2, cfv(cmg, c0), cfv(cur, c0)), c3, co(cfv(cfv(cod, c0), cfv(cur, c0)), cfv(cmg, c0), cfv(cur, c0)), wcel(c0, crg))
  oveq1i(cfv(cfv(cod, c0), cfv(cur, c0)), cfv(cmg, c0), cfv(cur, c0), c2)
  chrval(cfv(cod, c0), cfv(cur, c0), c2, c0)
  syl(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cod, c0), cfv(cur, c0)), cfv(cmg, c0), cfv(cur, c0)), c3), wcel(cfv(cur, c0), cfv(cbs, c0)))
  ringidcl(c0, cfv(cur, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cur, c0))
  odid(cfv(cur, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cod, c0), cfv(cmg, c0), c3, c0)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cod, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cmg, c0))
}

  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà Ring ‚Üí(c1 ` c2)= c3)

} = {

  mpdan(c0 ‚àà Ring, (c1 ` c2)=(c2[(.g ` c0)](1r ` c0)), c2 ‚àà ‚Ñ§)
  nn0zd(c2, c0 ‚àà Ring)
  chrcl(c0, c2)
  zrhmulg(c0, c2, c1, (.g ` c0), (1r ` c0))
  syl5eqr((c2[(.g ` c0)](1r ` c0)), c3, (((od ` c0)`(1r ` c0))[(.g ` c0)](1r ` c0)), c0 ‚àà Ring)
  oveq1i(((od ` c0)`(1r ` c0)), (.g ` c0), (1r ` c0), c2)

  syl(c0 ‚àà Ring, (((od ` c0)`(1r ` c0))[(.g ` c0)](1r ` c0))= c3, (1r ` c0)‚àà(Base ` c0))
  ringidcl(c0, (1r ` c0), (Base ` c0))
  eqid((1r ` c0))

  eqid((od ` c0))
  eqid((.g ` c0))
}

blocks.name: chrdvds
blocks.content: The ` ZZ ` ring homomorphism is zero only at multiples of the characteristic. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm chrdvds(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, cz)), wb(wbr(c2, cdvds, c1), wceq(cfv(c3, c1), c4)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cchr, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(czrh, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c0))
} = {
  bitr4d(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, cz)), wbr(c2, cdvds, c1), wceq(cfv(c3, c1), c4), wceq(co(c1, cfv(cmg, c0), cfv(cur, c0)), c4))
  syl5bbr(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, cz)), wbr(c2, cdvds, c1), wceq(co(c1, cfv(cmg, c0), cfv(cur, c0)), c4), wbr(cfv(cfv(cod, c0), cfv(cur, c0)), cdvds, c1))
  breq1i(cfv(cfv(cod, c0), cfv(cur, c0)), cdvds, c1, c2)
  chrval(cfv(cod, c0), cfv(cur, c0), c2, c0)
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, cz)), wb(wbr(cfv(cfv(cod, c0), cfv(cur, c0)), cdvds, c1), wceq(co(c1, cfv(cmg, c0), cfv(cur, c0)), c4)), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(cfv(cur, c0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(c1, cz))
  adantr(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  ringgrp(c0)
  adantr(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(cfv(cur, c0), cfv(cbs, c0)))
  ringidcl(c0, cfv(cur, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))
  simpr(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, cz))
  oddvds(c0, cfv(cur, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), c1, cfv(cod, c0), cfv(cmg, c0), c4)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cod, c0))
  eqeq1d(cfv(c3, c1), c4, co(c1, cfv(cmg, c0), cfv(cur, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, cz)))
  zrhmulg(c0, c1, c3, cfv(cmg, c0), cfv(cur, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cmg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cur, c0))
}

blocks.name: chrcong
blocks.content: If two integers are congruent relative to the ring characteristic, their images in the ring are the same. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm chrcong(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {

  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cchr, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(czrh, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(c0g, c0))
} = {
  bitr4d(w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wbr(c3, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wceq(cfv(c4, c1), cfv(c4, c2)), wceq(co(c1, cfv(cmg, c0), cfv(cur, c0)), co(c2, cfv(cmg, c0), cfv(cur, c0))))
  syl5bbr(w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wbr(c3, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wceq(co(c1, cfv(cmg, c0), cfv(cur, c0)), co(c2, cfv(cmg, c0), cfv(cur, c0))), wbr(cfv(cfv(cod, c0), cfv(cur, c0)), cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)))
  breq1i(cfv(cfv(cod, c0), cfv(cur, c0)), cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2), c3)
  chrval(cfv(cod, c0), cfv(cur, c0), c3, c0)
  syl112anc(w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wb(wbr(cfv(cfv(cod, c0), cfv(cur, c0)), cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wceq(co(c1, cfv(cmg, c0), cfv(cur, c0)), co(c2, cfv(cmg, c0), cfv(cur, c0)))), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(cfv(cur, c0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  ringgrp(c0)
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(cfv(cur, c0), cfv(cbs, c0)))

  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cod, c0))
  eqeq12d(cfv(c4, c1), cfv(c4, c2), co(c1, cfv(cmg, c0), cfv(cur, c0)), co(c2, cfv(cmg, c0), cfv(cur, c0)), w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wceq(cfv(c4, c1), co(c1, cfv(cmg, c0), cfv(cur, c0))))

blocks.name: znlidl
blocks.content: The set ` n ZZ ` is an ideal in ` ZZ ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jun-2015.) (Revised by AV, 13-Jun-2019.)

blocks.name: zncrng2
blocks.content: The value of the ` Z/nZ ` structure. It is defined as the quotient ring ` ZZ / n ZZ ` , with an "artificial" ordering added to make it a ` Toset ` . (In other words, ` Z/nZ ` is a _ring_ with an _order_ , but it is not an _ordered ring_ , which as a term implies that the order is compatible with the ring operations in some way.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jun-2015.) (Revised by AV, 13-Jun-2019.)

blocks.name: znval
blocks.content: The value of the ` Z/nZ ` structure. It is defined as the quotient ring ` ZZ / n ZZ ` , with an "artificial" ordering added to make it a ` Toset ` . (In other words, ` Z/nZ ` is a _ring_ with an _order_ , but it is not an _ordered ring_ , which as a term implies that the order is compatible with the ring operations in some way.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jun-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-May-2016.) (Revised by AV, 13-Jun-2019.)

blocks.name: znle
blocks.content: The value of the ` Z/nZ ` structure. It is defined as the quotient ring ` ZZ / n ZZ ` , with an "artificial" ordering added to make it a ` Toset ` . (In other words, ` Z/nZ ` is a _ring_ with an _order_ , but it is not an _ordered ring_ , which as a term implies that the order is compatible with the ring operations in some way.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jun-2015.) (Revised by AV, 13-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm znle(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn0), wceq(c1, ccom(ccom(c2, cle), ccnv(c2))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(crsp, zring))
  -| wceq(c4, co(zring, cqus, co(zring, cqg, cfv(c3, csn(c0)))))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(czn, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cres(cfv(czrh, c4), c6))
  -| wceq(c6, cif(cz, co(nat0, cfzo, c0), wceq(c0, nat0)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cple, c5))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(c1, ccom(ccom(c2, cle), ccnv(c2)), cfv(cple, c5), cfv(cple, co(c4, csts, cop(cfv(cple, cnx), ccom(ccom(c2, cle), ccnv(c2))))), wcel(c0, cn0))
  fveq2d(cple, c5, co(c4, csts, cop(cfv(cple, cnx), ccom(ccom(c2, cle), ccnv(c2)))), wcel(c0, cn0))
  znval(c0, c5, c4, ccom(ccom(c2, cle), ccnv(c2)), c3, c2, c6)
  eqid(ccom(ccom(c2, cle), ccnv(c2)))
  mp2an(wceq(ccom(ccom(c2, cle), ccnv(c2)), cfv(cple, co(c4, csts, cop(cfv(cple, cnx), ccom(ccom(c2, cle), ccnv(c2)))))), wcel(c4, universe), wcel(ccom(ccom(c2, cle), ccnv(c2)), universe))
  ovexi(c4, zring, cqus, co(zring, cqg, cfv(c3, csn(c0))))
  coex(ccom(c2, cle), ccnv(c2))
  coex(c2, cle)
  ssexi(cle, cxp(cxr, cxr))
  xpex(cxr, cxr)
  xrex()
  lerelxr()
  cnvex(c2)
  eqeltri(c2, universe, cres(cfv(czrh, c4), c6))
  resex(cfv(czrh, c4), c6)
  fvex(czrh, c4)
  setsid(c4, universe, ccom(ccom(c2, cle), ccnv(c2)), universe, cple)
  pleid()
}

thm znle(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0 ‚Üí c1 =((c2 ‚àò ‚â§)‚àò `' c2))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(RSpan ` ZZring)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(ZZring[/s](ZZring[~QG](c3 ` { c0 })))
  ‚ä£ c5 =(Z/nZ ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =((ZRHom ` c4)|` c6)
  ‚ä£ c6 = if(c0 = 0, ‚Ñ§,(0[..^]c0))
  ‚ä£ c1 =(le ` c5)
} = {
  3eqtr4g(c1, ((c2 ‚àò ‚â§)‚àò `' c2), (le ` c5), (le `(c4[sSet]<(le ` ndx),((c2 ‚àò ‚â§)‚àò `' c2)>)), c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0)
  fveq2d(cple, c5, (c4[sSet]<(le ` ndx),((c2 ‚àò ‚â§)‚àò `' c2)>), c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0)
  znval(c0, c5, c4, ((c2 ‚àò ‚â§)‚àò `' c2), c3, c2, c6)
  eqid(((c2 ‚àò ‚â§)‚àò `' c2))
  mp2an(((c2 ‚àò ‚â§)‚àò `' c2)=(le `(c4[sSet]<(le ` ndx),((c2 ‚àò ‚â§)‚àò `' c2)>)), c4 ‚àà ùïå, ((c2 ‚àò ‚â§)‚àò `' c2)‚àà ùïå)
  ovexi(c4, zring, cqus, (ZZring[~QG](c3 ` { c0 })))
  coex((c2 ‚àò ‚â§), `' c2)
  coex(c2, cle)
  ssexi(cle, (‚Ñù* √ó ‚Ñù*))
  xpex(cxr, cxr)
  xrex()
  lerelxr()
  cnvex(c2)
  eqeltri(c2, universe, ((ZRHom ` c4)|` c6))
  resex((ZRHom ` c4), c6)
  fvex(czrh, c4)
  setsid(c4, universe, ((c2 ‚àò ‚â§)‚àò `' c2), universe, cple)
  pleid()
}

blocks.name: znval2
blocks.content: Self-referential expression for the ` Z/nZ ` structure. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jun-2015.) (Revised by AV, 13-Jun-2019.)

thm znval2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn0), wceq(c1, co(c2, csts, cop(cfv(cple, cnx), c3))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(crsp, zring))
  -| wceq(c2, co(zring, cqus, co(zring, cqg, cfv(c4, csn(c0)))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(czn, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cple, c1))
} = {
  eqtr4d(c1, co(c2, csts, cop(cfv(cple, cnx), c3)), co(c2, csts, cop(cfv(cple, cnx), ccom(ccom(cres(cfv(czrh, c2), cif(cz, co(nat0, cfzo, c0), wceq(c0, nat0))), cle), ccnv(cres(cfv(czrh, c2), cif(cz, co(nat0, cfzo, c0), wceq(c0, nat0))))))), wcel(c0, cn0))
  znval(c0, c1, c2, ccom(ccom(cres(cfv(czrh, c2), cif(cz, co(nat0, cfzo, c0), wceq(c0, nat0))), cle), ccnv(cres(cfv(czrh, c2), cif(cz, co(nat0, cfzo, c0), wceq(c0, nat0))))), c4, cres(cfv(czrh, c2), cif(cz, co(nat0, cfzo, c0), wceq(c0, nat0))), cif(cz, co(nat0, cfzo, c0), wceq(c0, nat0)))
  eqid(ccom(ccom(cres(cfv(czrh, c2), cif(cz, co(nat0, cfzo, c0), wceq(c0, nat0))), cle), ccnv(cres(cfv(czrh, c2), cif(cz, co(nat0, cfzo, c0), wceq(c0, nat0))))))
  oveq2d(c2, csts, cop(cfv(cple, cnx), c3), cop(cfv(cple, cnx), ccom(ccom(cres(cfv(czrh, c2), cif(cz, co(nat0, cfzo, c0), wceq(c0, nat0))), cle), ccnv(cres(cfv(czrh, c2), cif(cz, co(nat0, cfzo, c0), wceq(c0, nat0)))))), wcel(c0, cn0))
  opeq2d(cfv(cple, cnx), c3, ccom(ccom(cres(cfv(czrh, c2), cif(cz, co(nat0, cfzo, c0), wceq(c0, nat0))), cle), ccnv(cres(cfv(czrh, c2), cif(cz, co(nat0, cfzo, c0), wceq(c0, nat0))))), wcel(c0, cn0))
  znle(c0, c3, cres(cfv(czrh, c2), cif(cz, co(nat0, cfzo, c0), wceq(c0, nat0))), c4, c2, c1, cif(cz, co(nat0, cfzo, c0), wceq(c0, nat0)))
  eqid(cres(cfv(czrh, c2), cif(cz, co(nat0, cfzo, c0), wceq(c0, nat0))))
  eqid(cif(cz, co(nat0, cfzo, c0), wceq(c0, nat0)))
}

blocks.origin:
thm znbaslem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn0), wceq(cfv(c1, c2), cfv(c1, c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(crsp, zring))
  -| wceq(c2, co(zring, cqus, co(zring, cqg, cfv(c4, csn(c0)))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(czn, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cslot(c5))
  -| wcel(c5, cn)
  -| wbr(c5, clt, cdc(nat1, nat0))
} = {
  syl6reqr(cfv(c1, c2), cfv(c1, c3), cfv(c1, co(c2, csts, cop(cfv(cple, cnx), cfv(cple, c3)))), wcel(c0, cn0))
  fveq2d(c1, c3, co(c2, csts, cop(cfv(cple, cnx), cfv(cple, c3))), wcel(c0, cn0))
  znval2(c0, c3, c2, cfv(cple, c3), c4)
  eqid(cfv(cple, c3))
  setsnid(c1, c2, cfv(cple, cnx), cfv(cple, c3))
  ndxid(c1, c5)
  mpbir(wne(cfv(c1, cnx), cfv(cple, cnx)), wne(c5, cdc(nat1, nat0)))
  ltneii(c5, cdc(nat1, nat0))
  nnrei(c5)
  neeq12i(cfv(c1, cnx), cfv(cple, cnx), c5, cdc(nat1, nat0))
  ndxarg(c1, c5)
  plendx()
}

thm znbaslem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0 ‚Üí(c1 ` c2)=(c1 ` c3))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(RSpan ` ZZring)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(ZZring[/s](ZZring[~QG](c4 ` { c0 })))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Z/nZ ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c1 = Slot(c5)
  ‚ä£ c5 ‚àà ‚Ñï
  ‚ä£ c5[<]cdc(1, 0)
} = {
  syl6reqr((c1 ` c2), (c1 ` c3), (c1 `(c2[sSet]<(le ` ndx),(le ` c3)>)), c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0)
  fveq2d(c1, c3, (c2[sSet]<(le ` ndx),(le ` c3)>), c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0)
  znval2(c0, c3, c2, (le ` c3), c4)
  eqid((le ` c3))
  setsnid(c1, c2, (le ` ndx), (le ` c3))
  ndxid(c1, c5)
  mpbir((c1 ` ndx)‚â†(le ` ndx), c5 ‚â† cdc(1, 0))
  ltneii(c5, cdc(1, 0))
  nnrei(c5)
  neeq12i((c1 ` ndx), (le ` ndx), c5, cdc(1, 0))
  ndxarg(c1, c5)
  plendx()
}

blocks.name: znbas2
blocks.content: The base set of ` Z/nZ ` is the same as the quotient ring it is based on. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jun-2015.) (Revised by AV, 13-Jun-2019.)

blocks.name: znadd
blocks.content: The additive structure of ` Z/nZ ` is the same as the quotient ring it is based on. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jun-2015.) (Revised by AV, 13-Jun-2019.)

blocks.name: znmul
blocks.content: The multiplicative structure of ` Z/nZ ` is the same as the quotient ring it is based on. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jun-2015.) (Revised by AV, 13-Jun-2019.)

blocks.name: znzrh
blocks.content: The ` ZZ ` ring homomorphism of ` Z/nZ ` is inherited from the quotient ring it is based on. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jun-2015.) (Revised by AV, 13-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm znzrh(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn0), wceq(cfv(czrh, c1), cfv(czrh, c2)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(crsp, zring))
  -| wceq(c1, co(zring, cqus, co(zring, cqg, cfv(c3, csn(c0)))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(czn, c0))
} = {
  zrhpropd(hs0, hs1, c1, c2, cfv(cbs, c1), wcel(c0, cn0))
  eqidd(cfv(cbs, c1), wcel(c0, cn0))
  znbas2(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, cfv(cplusg, c1), cfv(cplusg, c2), wcel(c0, cn0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c1)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c1))))
  znadd(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, cfv(cmulr, c1), cfv(cmulr, c2), wcel(c0, cn0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c1)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c1))))
  znmul(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c1))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cn0))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(c0, cn0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm znzrh(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0 ‚Üí(ZRHom ` c1)=(ZRHom ` c2))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(RSpan ` ZZring)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(ZZring[/s](ZZring[~QG](c3 ` { c0 })))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Z/nZ ` c0)
} = {
  zrhpropd(hs0, hs1, c1, c2, (Base ` c1), c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0)
  eqidd((Base ` c1), c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0)
  znbas2(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, (+ ` c1), (+ ` c2), c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0, (hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c1)‚àß hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c1)))
  znadd(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, (√ó ` c1), (√ó ` c2), c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0, (hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c1)‚àß hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c1)))
  znmul(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c((Base ` c1))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c((Base ` c1))
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0)
  diff.hs1.w(c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0)
}

blocks.name: znbas
blocks.content: The base set of ` Z/nZ ` structure. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jun-2015.) (Revised by AV, 13-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm znbas(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn0), wceq(cqs(cz, c1), cfv(cbs, c2)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(crsp, zring))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(czn, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, co(zring, cqg, cfv(c3, csn(c0))))
} = {
  eqtrd(cqs(cz, c1), cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, co(zring, cqus, c1)), wcel(c0, cn0))
  qusbas(cz, c1, co(zring, cqus, c1), zring, universe, crg, wcel(c0, cn0))
  eqidd(co(zring, cqus, c1), wcel(c0, cn0))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cn0), wceq(cz, cfv(cbs, zring)))
  zringbas()
  a1i(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, universe))
  ovexi(c1, zring, cqg, cfv(c3, csn(c0)))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(zring, crg))
  zringring()
  znbas2(c0, co(zring, cqus, c1), c2, c3)
  oveq2i(zring, cqus, c1, co(zring, cqg, cfv(c3, csn(c0))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm znbas(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0 ‚Üí(‚Ñ§ /. c1)=(Base ` c2))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(RSpan ` ZZring)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Z/nZ ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(ZZring[~QG](c3 ` { c0 }))
} = {
  eqtrd((‚Ñ§ /. c1), (Base ` c2), (Base `(ZZring[/s]c1)), c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0)
  qusbas(cz, c1, (ZZring[/s]c1), zring, universe, crg, c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0)
  eqidd((ZZring[/s]c1), c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0)
  a1i(c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0, ‚Ñ§ =(Base ` ZZring))
  zringbas()
  a1i(c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0, c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  ovexi(c1, zring, cqg, (c3 ` { c0 }))
  a1i(c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0, ZZring ‚àà Ring)
  zringring()
  znbas2(c0, (ZZring[/s]c1), c2, c3)
  oveq2i(zring, cqus, c1, (ZZring[~QG](c3 ` { c0 })))
}

blocks.content: ` Z/nZ ` is a commutative ring. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jun-2015.)

thm zncrng(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, ccrg))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(czn, c0))
} = {
  mpbid(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, ccrg), wcel(co(zring, cqus, co(zring, cqg, cfv(cfv(crsp, zring), csn(c0)))), ccrg))
  syl(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(co(zring, cqus, co(zring, cqg, cfv(cfv(crsp, zring), csn(c0)))), ccrg), wcel(c0, cz))
  nn0z(c0)
  zncrng2(c0, co(zring, cqus, co(zring, cqg, cfv(cfv(crsp, zring), csn(c0)))), cfv(crsp, zring))
  crngpropd(hs0, hs1, co(zring, cqus, co(zring, cqg, cfv(cfv(crsp, zring), csn(c0)))), c1, cfv(cbs, co(zring, cqus, co(zring, cqg, cfv(cfv(crsp, zring), csn(c0))))), wcel(c0, cn0))
  eqidd(cfv(cbs, co(zring, cqus, co(zring, cqg, cfv(cfv(crsp, zring), csn(c0))))), wcel(c0, cn0))
  znbas2(c0, co(zring, cqus, co(zring, cqg, cfv(cfv(crsp, zring), csn(c0)))), c1, cfv(crsp, zring))
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, cfv(cplusg, co(zring, cqus, co(zring, cqg, cfv(cfv(crsp, zring), csn(c0))))), cfv(cplusg, c1), wcel(c0, cn0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, co(zring, cqus, co(zring, cqg, cfv(cfv(crsp, zring), csn(c0)))))), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, co(zring, cqus, co(zring, cqg, cfv(cfv(crsp, zring), csn(c0))))))))
  znadd(c0, co(zring, cqus, co(zring, cqg, cfv(cfv(crsp, zring), csn(c0)))), c1, cfv(crsp, zring))
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, cfv(cmulr, co(zring, cqus, co(zring, cqg, cfv(cfv(crsp, zring), csn(c0))))), cfv(cmulr, c1), wcel(c0, cn0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, co(zring, cqus, co(zring, cqg, cfv(cfv(crsp, zring), csn(c0)))))), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, co(zring, cqus, co(zring, cqg, cfv(cfv(crsp, zring), csn(c0))))))))
  znmul(c0, co(zring, cqus, co(zring, cqg, cfv(cfv(crsp, zring), csn(c0)))), c1, cfv(crsp, zring))
  eqid(cfv(crsp, zring))
  eqid(co(zring, cqus, co(zring, cqg, cfv(cfv(crsp, zring), csn(c0)))))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(co(zring, cqus, co(zring, cqg, cfv(cfv(crsp, zring), csn(c0)))))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, co(zring, cqus, co(zring, cqg, cfv(cfv(crsp, zring), csn(c0))))))
  diff.hs1.c(co(zring, cqus, co(zring, cqg, cfv(cfv(crsp, zring), csn(c0)))))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, co(zring, cqus, co(zring, cqg, cfv(cfv(crsp, zring), csn(c0))))))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cn0))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(c0, cn0))
}

thm zncrng(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà CRing)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Z/nZ ` c0)
} = {
  mpbid(c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0, c1 ‚àà CRing, (ZZring[/s](ZZring[~QG]((RSpan ` ZZring)` { c0 })))‚àà CRing)

  crngpropd(hs0, hs1, (ZZring[/s](ZZring[~QG]((RSpan ` ZZring)` { c0 }))), c1, (Base `(ZZring[/s](ZZring[~QG]((RSpan ` ZZring)` { c0 })))), c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0)
  eqidd((Base `(ZZring[/s](ZZring[~QG]((RSpan ` ZZring)` { c0 })))), c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0)
  znbas2(c0, (ZZring[/s](ZZring[~QG]((RSpan ` ZZring)` { c0 }))), c1, (RSpan ` ZZring))
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, (+ `(ZZring[/s](ZZring[~QG]((RSpan ` ZZring)` { c0 })))), (+ ` c1), c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0, (hs0 ‚àà(Base `(ZZring[/s](ZZring[~QG]((RSpan ` ZZring)` { c0 }))))‚àß hs1 ‚àà(Base `(ZZring[/s](ZZring[~QG]((RSpan ` ZZring)` { c0 }))))))
  znadd(c0, (ZZring[/s](ZZring[~QG]((RSpan ` ZZring)` { c0 }))), c1, (RSpan ` ZZring))
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, (√ó `(ZZring[/s](ZZring[~QG]((RSpan ` ZZring)` { c0 })))), (√ó ` c1), c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0, (hs0 ‚àà(Base `(ZZring[/s](ZZring[~QG]((RSpan ` ZZring)` { c0 }))))‚àß hs1 ‚àà(Base `(ZZring[/s](ZZring[~QG]((RSpan ` ZZring)` { c0 }))))))
  znmul(c0, (ZZring[/s](ZZring[~QG]((RSpan ` ZZring)` { c0 }))), c1, (RSpan ` ZZring))
  eqid((RSpan ` ZZring))

  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c((Base `(ZZring[/s](ZZring[~QG]((RSpan ` ZZring)` { c0 })))))

blocks.name: znzrh2
blocks.content: The ` ZZ ` ring homomorphism maps elements to their equivalence classes. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jun-2015.) (Revised by AV, 13-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm znzrh2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn0), wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, cz, cec(cv(s0), c2))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(crsp, zring))
  -| wceq(c2, co(zring, cqg, cfv(c3, csn(c0))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(czn, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(czrh, c4))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  syl5eq(c1, cmpt(s0, cz, cec(cv(s0), c2)), cfv(czrh, c4), wcel(c0, cn0))
  eqtr2d(cfv(czrh, c4), cmpt(s0, cz, cec(cv(s0), c2)), cfv(czrh, co(zring, cqus, c2)), wcel(c0, cn0))

  sylancr(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(cmpt(s0, cz, cec(cv(s0), c2)), co(zring, crh, co(zring, cqus, c2))), wcel(zring, crg), wcel(cfv(c3, csn(c0)), cfv(clidl, zring)))

  eceq2(c2, co(zring, cqg, cfv(c3, csn(c0))), cv(s0))

blocks.name: znzrhval
blocks.content: The ` ZZ ` ring homomorphism maps elements to their equivalence classes. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jun-2015.) (Revised by AV, 13-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm znzrhval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cz)), wceq(cfv(c2, c1), cec(c1, c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(crsp, zring))
  -| wceq(c3, co(zring, cqg, cfv(c4, csn(c0))))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(czn, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(czrh, c5))
} = {
  sylan9eq(cfv(c2, c1), cec(c1, c3), cfv(cmpt(hs0, cz, cec(cv(hs0), c3)), c1), wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cz))
  fveq1d(c2, c1, cmpt(hs0, cz, cec(cv(hs0), c3)), wcel(c0, cn0))
  znzrh2(hs0, c0, c2, c3, c4, c5)
  fvmpt(hs0, c1, cz, cmpt(hs0, cz, cec(cv(hs0), c3)), cec(c1, c3), cec(cv(hs0), c3))
  eceq1(cv(hs0), c1, c3)
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, cz, cec(cv(hs0), c3)))
  ax-mp(wcel(cec(c1, c3), universe), wcel(c3, universe))
  ovexi(c3, zring, cqg, cfv(c4, csn(c0)))
  ecexg(c3, universe, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cz)
  diff.hs0.c(cec(c1, c3))

  eqidd(co(zring, cqus, co(zring, cqg, cfv(cfv(crsp, zring), csn(c0)))), wcel(c0, cn0))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cn0), wceq(cz, cfv(cbs, zring)))
  zringbas()
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, cz, cec(cv(hs0), co(zring, cqg, cfv(cfv(crsp, zring), csn(c0))))))
  ovexd(zring, cqg, cfv(cfv(crsp, zring), csn(c0)), wcel(c0, cn0))

  syl6eqr(cqs(cz, co(zring, cqg, cfv(cfv(crsp, zring), csn(c0)))), c2, cfv(cbs, c3), wcel(c0, cn0))
  znbas(c0, co(zring, cqg, cfv(cfv(crsp, zring), csn(c0))), c3, cfv(crsp, zring))
  foeq3(cqs(cz, co(zring, cqg, cfv(cfv(crsp, zring), csn(c0)))), c2, cmpt(hs0, cz, cec(cv(hs0), co(zring, cqg, cfv(cfv(crsp, zring), csn(c0))))), cz)
  syl(wcel(c0, cn0), wb(wfo(c1, cz, c2), wfo(cmpt(hs0, cz, cec(cv(hs0), co(zring, cqg, cfv(cfv(crsp, zring), csn(c0))))), cz, c2)), wceq(c1, cmpt(hs0, cz, cec(cv(hs0), co(zring, cqg, cfv(cfv(crsp, zring), csn(c0)))))))
  znzrh2(hs0, c0, c1, co(zring, cqg, cfv(cfv(crsp, zring), csn(c0))), cfv(crsp, zring), c3)
  eqid(cfv(crsp, zring))
  eqid(co(zring, cqg, cfv(cfv(crsp, zring), csn(c0))))
  foeq1(c1, cmpt(hs0, cz, cec(cv(hs0), co(zring, cqg, cfv(cfv(crsp, zring), csn(c0))))), cz, c2)

blocks.name: zncyg
blocks.content: The group ` ZZ / n ZZ ` is cyclic for all ` n ` (including ` n = 0 ` ). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm zncyg(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, ccyg))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(czn, c0))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, ccyg), wcel(c1, cgrp), wrex(hs1, cfv(cbs, c1), wceq(crn(cmpt(hs0, cz, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmg, c1), cv(hs1)))), cfv(cbs, c1))))
  syl(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cgrp), wcel(c1, crg))
  ringgrp(c1)
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, cn0), wrex(hs1, cfv(cbs, c1), wceq(crn(cmpt(hs0, cz, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmg, c1), cv(hs1)))), cfv(cbs, c1))), wcel(cfv(cur, c1), cfv(cbs, c1)), wceq(crn(cmpt(hs0, cz, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmg, c1), cfv(cur, c1)))), cfv(cbs, c1)))
  syl(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(cfv(cur, c1), cfv(cbs, c1)), wcel(c1, crg))
  ringidcl(c1, cfv(cur, c1), cfv(cbs, c1))
  eqtr3d(crn(cmpt(hs0, cz, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmg, c1), cfv(cur, c1)))), cfv(cbs, c1), crn(cfv(czrh, c1)), wcel(c0, cn0))
  rneqd(cfv(czrh, c1), cmpt(hs0, cz, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmg, c1), cfv(cur, c1))), wcel(c0, cn0))
  syl(wcel(c0, cn0), wceq(cfv(czrh, c1), cmpt(hs0, cz, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmg, c1), cfv(cur, c1)))), wcel(c1, crg))
  syl(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, crg), wcel(c1, ccrg))
  zncrng(c0, c1)
  crngring(c1)
  zrhval2(hs0, c1, cfv(czrh, c1), cfv(cmg, c1), cfv(cur, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cur, c1))
  syl(wcel(c0, cn0), wceq(crn(cfv(czrh, c1)), cfv(cbs, c1)), wfo(cfv(czrh, c1), cz, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  znzrhfo(c0, cfv(czrh, c1), cfv(cbs, c1), c1)
  eqid(cfv(czrh, c1))
  forn(cfv(czrh, c1), cz, cfv(cbs, c1))
  rspcev(hs1, cfv(cur, c1), cfv(cbs, c1), wceq(crn(cmpt(hs0, cz, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmg, c1), cfv(cur, c1)))), cfv(cbs, c1)), wceq(crn(cmpt(hs0, cz, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmg, c1), cv(hs1)))), cfv(cbs, c1)))
  eqeq1d(crn(cmpt(hs0, cz, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmg, c1), cv(hs1)))), cfv(cbs, c1), crn(cmpt(hs0, cz, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmg, c1), cfv(cur, c1)))), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cur, c1)))
  rneqd(cmpt(hs0, cz, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmg, c1), cv(hs1))), cmpt(hs0, cz, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmg, c1), cfv(cur, c1))), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cur, c1)))
  mpteq2dv(hs0, cz, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmg, c1), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmg, c1), cfv(cur, c1)), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cur, c1)))
  oveq2(cv(hs1), cfv(cur, c1), cv(hs0), cfv(cmg, c1))
  iscyg(hs1, hs0, c1, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cmg, c1))

blocks.name: znf1o

blocks.name: zzngim
blocks.content: The ` ZZ ` ring homomorphism is an isomorphism for ` N = 0 ` . (We only show group isomorphism here, but ring isomorphism follows, since it is a bijective ring homomorphism.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.) (Revised by AV, 13-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm zzngim(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wcel(c0, co(zring, cgim, c1))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(czn, nat0))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(czrh, c1))
} = {
  mpbir2an(wcel(c0, co(zring, cgim, c1)), wcel(c0, co(zring, cghm, c1)), wf1o(c0, cz, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  mp2b(wcel(c0, co(zring, cghm, c1)), wcel(c1, crg), wcel(c0, co(zring, crh, c1)))
  mp2b(wcel(c1, crg), wcel(nat0, cn0), wcel(c1, ccrg))
  zncrng(nat0, c1)
  crngring(c1)
  zrhrhm(c1, c0)
  rhmghm(c0, zring, c1)
  ax-mp(wf1o(c0, cz, cfv(cbs, c1)), wcel(nat0, cn0))
  znf1o(nat0, c0, cz, cfv(cbs, c1), c1)
  eqtr3i(c0, cres(cfv(czrh, c1), cz), cres(c0, cz))
  mp2b(wceq(cres(c0, cz), c0), wfo(c0, cz, cfv(cbs, c1)), wfn(c0, cz))
  ax-mp(wfo(c0, cz, cfv(cbs, c1)), wcel(nat0, cn0))
  0nn0()
  znzrhfo(nat0, c0, cfv(cbs, c1), c1)
  fofn(c0, cz, cfv(cbs, c1))
  fnresdm(c0, cz)
  reseq1i(c0, cz, cfv(czrh, c1))
  eqcomi(cz, cif(cz, co(nat0, cfzo, nat0), wceq(nat0, nat0)))
  iftruei(cz, co(nat0, cfzo, nat0), wceq(nat0, nat0))
  eqid(nat0)
  isgim(c0, zring, c1, cz, cfv(cbs, c1))
  zringbas()
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))
}

  coeq1d(cres(cfv(czrh, co(zring, cqus, co(zring, cqg, cfv(cfv(crsp, zring), csn(c0))))), c4), cle, c2, wcel(c0, cn0))

blocks.name: zntos
blocks.content: The ` Z/nZ ` structure is a totally ordered set. (The order is not respected by the operations, except in the case ` N = 0 ` when it coincides with the ordering on ` ZZ ` .) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jun-2015.)

blocks.name: znhash
blocks.content: The ` Z/nZ ` structure has ` n ` elements. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jun-2015.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: znfi
blocks.content: The ` Z/nZ ` structure is a finite ring. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-May-2016.)

blocks.name: znfld
blocks.content: The ` Z/nZ ` structure is a finite field when ` n ` is prime. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jun-2015.)

blocks.name: znidomb
blocks.content: The ` Z/nZ ` structure is a domain (and hence a field) precisely when ` n ` is prime. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jun-2015.)

blocks.origin:

} = {
  3eqtr2rd(cfv(chash, c1), cfv(cphi, c0), cfv(chash, crab(hs0, co(nat0, cfzo, c0), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cgcd, c0), nat1))), cfv(chash, cima(ccnv(cres(cfv(czrh, c2), co(nat0, cfzo, c0))), c1)), wcel(c0, cn))
  dfphi2(hs0, c0)
  fveq2d(chash, cima(ccnv(cres(cfv(czrh, c2), co(nat0, cfzo, c0))), c1), crab(hs0, co(nat0, cfzo, c0), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cgcd, c0), nat1)), wcel(c0, cn))
  syl6eqr(cima(ccnv(cres(cfv(czrh, c2), co(nat0, cfzo, c0))), c1), crab(hs0, co(nat0, cfzo, c0), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cgcd, c0), nat1)), cab(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, c0)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cgcd, c0), nat1))), wcel(c0, cn))
  abbi2dv(hs0, cima(ccnv(cres(cfv(czrh, c2), co(nat0, cfzo, c0))), c1), wcel(c0, cn), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, c0)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cgcd, c0), nat1)))
  bitrd(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(cres(cfv(czrh, c2), co(nat0, cfzo, c0))), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, c0)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cgcd, c0), nat1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, c0)), wcel(cfv(cres(cfv(czrh, c2), co(nat0, cfzo, c0)), cv(hs0)), c1)))

blocks.name: znrrg
blocks.content: The regular elements of ` Z/nZ ` are exactly the units. (This theorem fails for ` N = 0 ` , where all nonzero integers are regular, but only ` +- 1 ` are units.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: cygzn
blocks.content: A cyclic group with ` n ` elements is isomorphic to ` ZZ / n ZZ ` , and an infinite cyclic group is isomorphic to ` ZZ / 0 ZZ ~~ ZZ ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm cygzn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, ccyg), wbr(c0, cgic, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cif(cfv(chash, c2), nat0, wcel(c2, cfn)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(czn, c3))
} = {
  exlimddv(hs0, wcel(c0, ccyg), wbr(c0, cgic, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), crab(hs2, c2, wceq(crn(cmpt(hs1, cz, co(cv(hs1), cfv(cmg, c0), cv(hs2)))), c2))))
  sylib(wcel(c0, ccyg), wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), crab(hs2, c2, wceq(crn(cmpt(hs1, cz, co(cv(hs1), cfv(cmg, c0), cv(hs2)))), c2)))), wne(crab(hs2, c2, wceq(crn(cmpt(hs1, cz, co(cv(hs1), cfv(cmg, c0), cv(hs2)))), c2)), emptycls))
  simprbi(wcel(c0, ccyg), wne(crab(hs2, c2, wceq(crn(cmpt(hs1, cz, co(cv(hs1), cfv(cmg, c0), cv(hs2)))), c2)), emptycls), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  iscyg2(hs2, hs1, c0, crab(hs2, c2, wceq(crn(cmpt(hs1, cz, co(cv(hs1), cfv(cmg, c0), cv(hs2)))), c2)), c2, cfv(cmg, c0))
  n0(hs0, crab(hs2, c2, wceq(crn(cmpt(hs1, cz, co(cv(hs1), cfv(cmg, c0), cv(hs2)))), c2)))
  cygznlem3(hs2, hs1, hs3, c0, c1, c2, c3, cfv(cmg, c0), cfv(czrh, c1), crab(hs2, c2, wceq(crn(cmpt(hs1, cz, co(cv(hs1), cfv(cmg, c0), cv(hs2)))), c2)), cv(hs0), crn(cmpt(hs3, cz, cop(cfv(cfv(czrh, c1), cv(hs3)), co(cv(hs3), cfv(cmg, c0), cv(hs0))))), wa(wcel(c0, ccyg), wcel(cv(hs0), crab(hs2, c2, wceq(crn(cmpt(hs1, cz, co(cv(hs1), cfv(cmg, c0), cv(hs2)))), c2)))))
  eqid(cfv(cmg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(czrh, c1))

blocks.name: cygth
blocks.content: The "fundamental theorem of cyclic groups". Cyclic groups are exactly the additive groups ` ZZ / n ZZ ` , for ` 0 <_ n ` (where ` n = 0 ` is the infinite cyclic group ` ZZ ` ), up to isomorphism. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.)

blocks.name: cyggic
blocks.content: Cyclic groups are isomorphic precisely when they have the same order. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.)

thm cyggic(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccyg), wcel(c1, ccyg)), wb(wbr(c0, cgic, c1), wbr(c2, cen, c3)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c1))
} = {
  impbid2(wa(wcel(c0, ccyg), wcel(c1, ccyg)), wbr(c0, cgic, c1), wbr(c2, cen, c3))
  gicen(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, ccyg), wcel(c1, ccyg)), wbr(c2, cen, c3), wbr(c0, cgic, c1))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, ccyg), wcel(c1, ccyg)), wbr(c2, cen, c3)), wbr(c0, cgic, c1), wbr(c0, cgic, cfv(czn, cif(cfv(chash, c2), nat0, wcel(c2, cfn)))), wbr(cfv(czn, cif(cfv(chash, c2), nat0, wcel(c2, cfn))), cgic, c1))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, ccyg), wcel(c1, ccyg), wbr(c2, cen, c3), wbr(c0, cgic, cfv(czn, cif(cfv(chash, c2), nat0, wcel(c2, cfn)))))
  cygzn(c0, cfv(czn, cif(cfv(chash, c2), nat0, wcel(c2, cfn))), c2, cif(cfv(chash, c2), nat0, wcel(c2, cfn)))
  eqid(cif(cfv(chash, c2), nat0, wcel(c2, cfn)))
  eqid(cfv(czn, cif(cfv(chash, c2), nat0, wcel(c2, cfn))))
  eqbrtrd(cfv(czn, cif(cfv(chash, c2), nat0, wcel(c2, cfn))), cgic, c1, cfv(czn, cif(cfv(chash, c3), nat0, wcel(c3, cfn))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, ccyg), wcel(c1, ccyg)), wbr(c2, cen, c3)))
  fveq2d(czn, cif(cfv(chash, c2), nat0, wcel(c2, cfn)), cif(cfv(chash, c3), nat0, wcel(c3, cfn)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, ccyg), wcel(c1, ccyg)), wbr(c2, cen, c3)))
  ifbieq1d(cfv(chash, c2), nat0, cfv(chash, c3), wa(wa(wcel(c0, ccyg), wcel(c1, ccyg)), wbr(c2, cen, c3)), wcel(c2, cfn), wcel(c3, cfn))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, ccyg), wcel(c1, ccyg)), wbr(c2, cen, c3), wb(wcel(c2, cfn), wcel(c3, cfn)))
  enfi(c2, c3)
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, ccyg), wcel(c1, ccyg)), wbr(c2, cen, c3), wceq(cfv(chash, c2), cfv(chash, c3)))
  hasheni(c2, c3)
  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, ccyg), wcel(c1, ccyg)), wbr(c2, cen, c3)), wbr(cfv(czn, cif(cfv(chash, c3), nat0, wcel(c3, cfn))), cgic, c1), wbr(c1, cgic, cfv(czn, cif(cfv(chash, c3), nat0, wcel(c3, cfn)))))
  ad2antlr(wcel(c0, ccyg), wcel(c1, ccyg), wbr(c2, cen, c3), wbr(c1, cgic, cfv(czn, cif(cfv(chash, c3), nat0, wcel(c3, cfn)))))

  eqid(cif(cfv(chash, c3), nat0, wcel(c3, cfn)))
  eqid(cfv(czn, cif(cfv(chash, c3), nat0, wcel(c3, cfn))))
  gicsym(c1, cfv(czn, cif(cfv(chash, c3), nat0, wcel(c3, cfn))))

thm cyggic(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà CycGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà CycGrp)‚Üí(c0[~=g]c1 ‚Üî c2[‚âÖ]c3))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Base ` c1)

  impbid2((c0 ‚àà CycGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà CycGrp), c0[~ = g]c1, c2[‚âÖ]c3)
  gicen(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  ex((c0 ‚àà CycGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà CycGrp), c2[‚âÖ]c3, c0[~ = g]c1)
  syl2anc(((c0 ‚àà CycGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà CycGrp)‚àß c2[‚âÖ]c3), c0[~ = g]c1, c0[~ = g](Z/nZ ` if(c2 ‚àà Fin,(# ` c2), 0)), (Z/nZ ` if(c2 ‚àà Fin,(# ` c2), 0))[~ = g]c1)
  ad2antrr(c0 ‚àà CycGrp, c1 ‚àà CycGrp, c2[‚âÖ]c3, c0[~ = g](Z/nZ ` if(c2 ‚àà Fin,(# ` c2), 0)))
  cygzn(c0, (Z/nZ ` if(c2 ‚àà Fin,(# ` c2), 0)), c2, if(c2 ‚àà Fin,(# ` c2), 0))
  eqid(if(c2 ‚àà Fin,(# ` c2), 0))
  eqid((Z/nZ ` if(c2 ‚àà Fin,(# ` c2), 0)))
  eqbrtrd((Z/nZ ` if(c2 ‚àà Fin,(# ` c2), 0)), cgic, c1, (Z/nZ ` if(c3 ‚àà Fin,(# ` c3), 0)), ((c0 ‚àà CycGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà CycGrp)‚àß c2[‚âÖ]c3))
  fveq2d(czn, if(c2 ‚àà Fin,(# ` c2), 0), if(c3 ‚àà Fin,(# ` c3), 0), ((c0 ‚àà CycGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà CycGrp)‚àß c2[‚âÖ]c3))
  ifbieq1d((# ` c2), nat0, (# ` c3), ((c0 ‚àà CycGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà CycGrp)‚àß c2[‚âÖ]c3), c2 ‚àà Fin, c3 ‚àà Fin)
  adantl((c0 ‚àà CycGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà CycGrp), c2[‚âÖ]c3, (c2 ‚àà Fin ‚Üî c3 ‚àà Fin))
  enfi(c2, c3)
  adantl((c0 ‚àà CycGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà CycGrp), c2[‚âÖ]c3, (# ` c2)=(# ` c3))
  hasheni(c2, c3)
  syl(((c0 ‚àà CycGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà CycGrp)‚àß c2[‚âÖ]c3), (Z/nZ ` if(c3 ‚àà Fin,(# ` c3), 0))[~ = g]c1, c1[~ = g](Z/nZ ` if(c3 ‚àà Fin,(# ` c3), 0)))
  ad2antlr(c0 ‚àà CycGrp, c1 ‚àà CycGrp, c2[‚âÖ]c3, c1[~ = g](Z/nZ ` if(c3 ‚àà Fin,(# ` c3), 0)))
  cygzn(c1, (Z/nZ ` if(c3 ‚àà Fin,(# ` c3), 0)), c3, if(c3 ‚àà Fin,(# ` c3), 0))
  eqid(if(c3 ‚àà Fin,(# ` c3), 0))
  eqid((Z/nZ ` if(c3 ‚àà Fin,(# ` c3), 0)))

  gictr(c0, (Z/nZ ` if(c2 ‚àà Fin,(# ` c2), 0)), c1)
}

blocks.name: frgpcyg
blocks.content: A free group is cyclic iff it has zero or one generator. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.) (Proof shortened by AV, 18-Apr-2021.)
blocks.origin:
